name: search-remote
description: Extension for search for selected text in the remote providers

search-remote.noInputBoxIfTextSelected.title: No input box if text is selected
search-remote.noInputBoxIfTextSelected.description: If this is 'true' no input box will appear if selected text is searched. Default org will be applied.

search-remote.defaultProvider.title: Default search provider
search-remote.defaultProvider.description: Default search provider is Azure Repos

search-remote.defaultOrgName.title: Default azure org name
search-remote.defaultOrgName.description: Default org name is Azure Repos

search-remote.useDefaultProviderOnly.title: Use default search provider only.
search-remote.useDefaultProviderOnly.description: If true, only use the default search provider.

search-remote.ProviderMapping.title: Search providers
search-remote.ProviderMapping.description: the default search provider definitely is Azure Repos

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
